text: Aleksander "Sasha" Vujačić (born March 8, 1984) is a Slovenian former professional basketball player. He played parts of ten seasons in the National Basketball Association (NBA). He played for the Los Angeles Lakers, New Jersey Nets, Los Angeles Clippers, and New York Knicks. On June 17, 2010, Vujačić and the Lakers defeated the Boston Celtics 4 games to 3 to become NBA Champions. Vujačić helped the Lakers seal the championship by making 2 free throws with 11 seconds left in Game 7. Vujačić retired from playing professional basketball in 2019. Since retiring, he has become a winemaker. ==References== Category:1984 births Category:Living people Category:Los Angeles Clippers players Category:Los Angeles Lakers players Category:New Jersey Nets players Category:New York Knicks players Category:Slovenian sportspeople
title: Sasha Vujačić
